title: Access Organizations
description: Access Organizations control the look and feel of your login page and the authentication domain it is located at.

links.title: Access Organization Details
Create Access Organization
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/organizations" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Widget Corps Internal Applications","auth_domain":"test.cloudflareaccess.com","login_design":{"background_color":"#c5ed1b","text_color":"#c5ed1b","logo_path":"https://example.com/logo.png","header_text":"This is an example description.","footer_text":"This is an example description."}}'

name.description: The name of your Access Organization.

auth_domain.description: The domain that you will be redirected to on Access login attempts

login_design.example:
{
  "background_color": "#c5ed1b",
  "text_color": "#c5ed1b",
  "logo_path": "https://example.com/logo.png",
  "header_text": "This is an example description.",
  "footer_text": "This is an example description."
}

background_color.description: The background color on your login page

text_color.description: The text color on your login page

logo_path.description: The URL of the logo you want to display to users logging in

header_text.description: The header description on the team domain login page.

footer_text.description: The footer description on the team domain login page.

links.title: Update Access Organization
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/organizations" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"name":"Widget Corps Internal Applications","auth_domain":"test.cloudflareaccess.com","login_design":{"background_color":"#c5ed1b","text_color":"#c5ed1b","logo_path":"https://example.com/logo.png","header_text":"This is an example description.","footer_text":"This is an example description."}}'

links.title: Delete Access Organization
links.description: Delete an Access Organization. **WARNING: This will delete everything related to Access on your Accounts**

links.description: Revoke any outstanding tokens issued for a specific user

email.description: The email of the user to revoke
